column4: Ok, I'll try the question to everyone again: Problem is default screen resolution when booting up with the monitor cable out. I've reconfigured xserver with "sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg" and deselected all resolutions than 1280x1024, but it reboots in 1024x768 anyway... how do I change this behavior?
check the settings thingie under applications menu, system tools or something
gnome settings or something (you might have to add it to the menu to access it)
and then goto desktop>gnome>0 or something and make sure the res is the one you want
